summary: When Christian finds out his runaway teenage daughter, Jesse has been sexually attacked, the suburban father loses it. Setting out to find Jesse's attacker, Christian goes on a violent rampage.
cast: Peter Marshall|Caroline Marohasy|Brad McMurray|Jack Henry|Christopher Sommers|Evert McQueen|Steven Tandy|Bryan Probets|Chris Betts|Damon Gibson|Ron Kelly|Robyn Moore|Hannah Levien|Greg Jones|Mick Glancy|Rhye Copeman|Cameron McKay|Warren Meacham
title: The Horseman
